BackstoryDef.title: Young Goddess
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into the world from the wishes of [PAWN_possessive] people. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time learning to serve [PAWN_possessive] people and trying to the best of [PAWN_possessive] ability to fullfill their wishes.

BackstoryDef.title: Loyal Handmaiden
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to serve [PAWN_possessive] Godess. [PAWN_nameDef] commits the majority of [PAWN_possessive] time in the shadow of the Godess taking on the will of the Godess as [PAWN_possessive] her own.
